Description:
312234823 - SN: INHD040422/01
You as a Principle contractor have not taken suitable and sufficient steps (including the provision of suitable and sufficient emergency procedures, suitable emergency routes and exits and suitable and sufficient firefighting equipment and alarm systems) to prevent so far as is reasonably practicable the risk of injury to any person during the carrying out of construction work arising from fire.

312234931  - SN:INHD040422/02
You have not ensured that welfare facilities are available on your site at Broadlie Road, Neilston which are sufficient to comply with Schedule 2 of the Construction (Design and Management) Regulations 2015
